title: Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse; PS/2 and USB; 300 DPI; colors: red, gray, white
descriptions:
**Product Title:** Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse

**Product Description:**

Experience the convenience and comfort of the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse. This trackball mouse is designed to fit comfortably in your hand, reducing fatigue and strain while working or browsing.

**Key Features:**

- **Trackball Technology:** Navigate your screen with precision using the trackball, allowing for smooth and accurate cursor movement.
- **Side-to-Side Scrolling:** Easily scroll through documents and web pages with the side-to-side scrolling feature.
- **Two-Button Design:** The two-button layout provides a simple and intuitive way to interact with your computer.
- **Ambidextrous Design:** Suitable for both left-handed and right-handed users, making it a great option for anyone.
- **300 DPI Resolution:** Enjoy accurate cursor movement with the 300 DPI resolution.
- **Connectivity Options:** Connect to your computer via PS/2 or USB, providing flexibility and convenience.

**Product Specifications:**

- **Dimensions:** 7 inches (length) x 4 inches (width) x 2.5 inches (height)
- **Colors:** Available in red, gray, and white
- **Country of Origin:** China

**What's in the Box:**

- Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse
- User manual
- Warranty information

**Warranty Information:**

- 1-year limited warranty
- Dedicated customer support

**Return Policy:**

- Returns accepted within 30 days of purchase
- Item must be in original condition with all packaging and accessories included

**Order Now:**

Get your Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse today and experience the comfort and convenience of trackball navigation.
